description: Discover wild animals, build geography skills and stimulate curiosity about our Earth with our educational, rotating “Children’s World Globe” puzzle! A uniquely rounded puzzling experience. perfectly crafted, curved, plastic puzzle pieces allow for an exact fit and are easily assembled to form a solid, smooth ball - no glue required. rotating display stand included. Ideal for curious kids, this educational 3D puzzle is suitable for ages 7 to 12 and offers a hands-on way for kids and pre-teens to learn about geography. Once constructed, the 3D puzzle stands upright on its own with the included rotating display stand and has an easy-clean, peel-resistant surface so children can proudly display the Globe in a bedroom or playroom and keep it handy for planning future voyages.
